data.title: Mastercard says the no-number Apple Card comes with 'enhanced security' users will never see
data.text: The Apple Card is more secure because users get a one-time-use number in the Wallet app, says the president of Mastercard's North American operations.

data.title: Mastercard president Craig Vosburg on new Apple Card partnership
data.text: Craig Vosburg, president of Mastercard, joins CNBC's "Squawk Alley" team to discuss the company's new partnership with Goldman Sachs and Apple to introduce the Apple Card.

data.title: 3 Top Growth Stocks - to Buy Right Now
data.text: These three companies are growing like weeds, and investors should take notice.
